symptoms.name: headache
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the head, scalp, or neck

symptoms.name: fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature above normal range

symptoms.name: cough
symptoms.description: Sudden expulsion of air from the lungs to clear airways

symptoms.name: cold
symptoms.description: Common viral infection affecting nose and throat

symptoms.name: sore throat
symptoms.description: Pain, scratchiness, or irritation of the throat

symptoms.name: stomach ache
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdominal region

symptoms.name: nausea
symptoms.description: Feeling of unease in stomach with urge to vomit

symptoms.name: fatigue
symptoms.description: Extreme tiredness and lack of energy

symptoms.name: insomnia
symptoms.description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep

symptoms.name: back pain

symptoms.name: joint pain
symptoms.description: Discomfort, aches, and soreness in body joints

symptoms.name: constipation

symptoms.name: diarrhea

symptoms.name: acne
symptoms.description: Skin condition causing pimples and inflammation

symptoms.name: anxiety

symptoms.name: stress

symptoms.name: high blood pressure

symptoms.name: low energy
symptoms.description: Lack of vitality and reduced stamina

symptoms.name: indigestion
symptoms.description: Discomfort in upper abdomen after eating

symptoms.name: allergies

symptoms.name: migraine

symptoms.name: dehydration
symptoms.description: Loss of more fluid than intake

symptoms.name: bloating
symptoms.description: Feeling of fullness or swelling in the abdomen

symptoms.name: muscle cramps
symptoms.description: Sudden, involuntary muscle contractions

symptoms.name: weight gain
symptoms.description: Increase in body weight

symptoms.name: dizziness

symptoms.name: heartburn
symptoms.description: Burning sensation in chest from acid reflux

symptoms.name: congestion
symptoms.description: Blocked or stuffy nasal passages

symptoms.name: runny nose
symptoms.description: Excess nasal discharge

symptoms.name: sneezing
symptoms.description: Sudden involuntary expulsion of air from nose

symptoms.name: itchy eyes
symptoms.description: Irritation causing desire to rub eyes

symptoms.name: dry skin
symptoms.description: Skin lacking moisture and hydration

symptoms.name: eczema
symptoms.description: Inflammatory skin condition causing itchy patches

symptoms.name: hair loss
symptoms.description: Excessive loss of hair from scalp or body

symptoms.name: depression
symptoms.description: Persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest

symptoms.name: memory issues
symptoms.description: Difficulty remembering or concentrating

symptoms.name: shortness of breath
symptoms.description: Difficulty breathing or feeling breathless

symptoms.name: chest pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the chest area

symptoms.name: palpitations
symptoms.description: Awareness of heart beating rapidly or irregularly

symptoms.name: swelling
symptoms.description: Enlargement due to fluid accumulation

symptoms.name: bruising
symptoms.description: Discoloration from blood under the skin

symptoms.name: toothache
symptoms.description: Pain in or around a tooth

symptoms.name: bad breath
symptoms.description: Unpleasant odor from the mouth

symptoms.name: ear pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the ear

symptoms.name: tinnitus
symptoms.description: Ringing or buzzing sound in the ears

symptoms.name: eye strain
symptoms.description: Tired, aching eyes from overuse

symptoms.name: neck pain
symptoms.description: Pain or stiffness in the neck region

symptoms.name: shoulder pain
symptoms.description: Pain in the shoulder joint or muscles

symptoms.name: knee pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the knee

symptoms.name: foot pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the foot

symptoms.description: Signs related to blood sugar issues

symptoms.description: Symptoms related to thyroid dysfunction

symptoms.description: Pain during menstruation

symptoms.name: hot flashes
symptoms.description: Sudden feeling of warmth in upper body

symptoms.name: urinary issues
symptoms.description: Problems with urination

symptoms.name: acid reflux
symptoms.description: Stomach acid flowing back into esophagus

symptoms.name: food poisoning
symptoms.description: Illness from contaminated food

symptoms.name: hangover
symptoms.description: Symptoms after excessive alcohol consumption

symptoms.name: sunburn
symptoms.description: Skin damage from UV radiation

symptoms.name: motion sickness
symptoms.description: Nausea from motion during travel

home_remedies.name: Ginger Tea
home_remedies.description: A warm beverage made with fresh ginger root that helps with digestion and nausea
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Peel and slice fresh ginger. 2. Boil water and add ginger slices. 3. Simmer for 10 minutes. 4. Strain and add honey/lemon if desired.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Safe for most people. Avoid excessive consumption if on blood thinners.

home_remedies.name: Honey and Lemon Water
home_remedies.description: Warm water mixed with honey and fresh lemon juice for immune support
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Heat water until warm (not boiling). 2. Add honey and stir. 3. Squeeze in fresh lemon juice. 4. Drink while warm.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Not suitable for children under 1 year due to honey.

home_remedies.name: Turmeric Milk (Golden Milk)
home_remedies.description: Warm milk infused with turmeric and spices for anti-inflammatory benefits
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Heat milk in a pan. 2. Add turmeric, black pepper, and cinnamon. 3. Simmer for 5 minutes stirring occasionally. 4. Add honey for sweetness.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Avoid if lactose intolerant. Use plant-based milk as alternative. Black pepper enhances turmeric absorption.

home_remedies.name: Peppermint Tea
home_remedies.description: Herbal tea made with peppermint leaves for digestive and headache relief
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Place peppermint leaves in a cup. 2. Pour hot water over leaves. 3. Steep for 5-10 minutes. 4. Strain and add honey if desired.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Avoid if you have acid reflux or GERD. Not recommended for infants.

home_remedies.name: Salt Water Gargle
home_remedies.description: Warm salt water solution for gargling to relieve throat pain
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Dissolve salt in warm water. 2. Gargle for 30 seconds. 3. Spit out (do not swallow). 4. Repeat 2-3 times daily.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Do not swallow. Safe for most ages. Avoid if on sodium-restricted diet.

home_remedies.name: Steam Inhalation
home_remedies.description: Breathing in steam to clear congestion and open airways
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Boil water and pour into a bowl. 2. Add eucalyptus oil if using. 3. Cover head with towel over the bowl. 4. Breathe deeply for 5-10 minutes. 5. Keep eyes closed.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Keep safe distance to avoid burns. Not suitable for young children. Avoid if asthmatic without medical advice.

home_remedies.name: Apple Cider Vinegar Tonic
home_remedies.description: Diluted apple cider vinegar drink for digestive health
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Mix ACV in water thoroughly. 2. Add honey for taste. 3. Drink before meals. 4. Use a straw to protect teeth.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Always dilute - never drink undiluted. Can erode tooth enamel. Not recommended for those with stomach ulcers.

home_remedies.name: Chamomile Tea
home_remedies.description: Calming herbal tea made from chamomile flowers for relaxation
ingredients: Chamomile tea bag or dried flowers (1-2 tsp)
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Place chamomile in cup. 2. Add hot water. 3. Steep for 5 minutes covered. 4. Strain and add honey if desired. 5. Drink 30 mins before bed for sleep.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Avoid if allergic to ragweed or daisies. May interact with blood thinners and sedatives.

home_remedies.name: Aloe Vera Gel
home_remedies.description: Natural gel from aloe vera plant for skin healing and soothing
ingredients: Fresh aloe vera leaf or pure aloe gel
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Cut aloe leaf and extract clear gel. 2. Apply directly to affected area. 3. Leave for 15-20 minutes. 4. Rinse with cool water. 5. Repeat 2-3 times daily.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Do a patch test first for allergies. Do not apply to deep wounds. Use pure aloe without additives.

home_remedies.name: Cold Compress
home_remedies.description: Cold pack application for reducing inflammation and pain
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Wrap ice in cloth (never apply directly to skin). 2. Apply to affected area. 3. Keep for 15-20 minutes. 4. Take 10-minute breaks between applications.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Never apply ice directly to skin. Limit to 20 minutes at a time. Not for circulation problems.

home_remedies.name: Warm Compress
home_remedies.description: Warm cloth application for muscle relaxation and pain relief
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Soak cloth in warm water. 2. Wring out excess water. 3. Apply to affected area. 4. Replace when it cools down. 5. Continue for 15-20 minutes.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Test temperature before applying. Not for fresh injuries (first 48 hours). Avoid on open wounds.

home_remedies.name: Fennel Seeds Water
home_remedies.description: Water infused with fennel seeds for digestive comfort
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Soak fennel seeds in water overnight OR 2. Boil seeds in water for 5 minutes. 3. Strain and drink. 4. Can be consumed warm or at room temperature.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Safe for most people. Avoid excessive consumption during pregnancy. May interact with some medications.

home_remedies.name: Banana for Energy
home_remedies.description: Eating bananas for quick energy and electrolyte replenishment
home_remedies.preparation: Eat as a snack, add to smoothie, slice over oatmeal, or freeze for a cool treat.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Moderate consumption for diabetics due to sugar content. High in potassium - consult doctor if on certain medications.

home_remedies.name: Epsom Salt Bath
home_remedies.description: Warm bath with Epsom salts for muscle relaxation and detox
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Fill bathtub with warm water. 2. Add Epsom salt and stir to dissolve. 3. Add a few drops of lavender oil if desired. 4. Soak for 15-20 minutes. 5. Rinse and rest.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Avoid if you have diabetes, kidney problems, or heart conditions. Stay hydrated. Don't use very hot water.

home_remedies.name: Garlic Remedy
home_remedies.description: Raw or cooked garlic for immune support and cardiovascular health
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Crush or finely chop garlic to release allicin. 2. Let sit for 10 minutes to activate compounds. 3. Consume raw with honey or add to food. 4. Can also steep in warm water for garlic tea.
home_remedies.time_to_effect: Several hours to days for systemic effects
home_remedies.safety_notes: May cause digestive upset on empty stomach. Avoid before surgery. Can interact with blood thinners.

home_remedies.name: Oatmeal Bath
home_remedies.description: Colloidal oatmeal bath for skin relief and irritation
ingredients: Colloidal oatmeal or finely ground oats (1 cup)
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Grind oats into fine powder if not using colloidal oatmeal. 2. Add to running bath water. 3. Soak for 15-20 minutes. 4. Pat dry gently, don't rub. 5. Apply moisturizer after.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Use lukewarm water, not hot. Be careful as tub may be slippery. Avoid if allergic to oats.

home_remedies.name: Cinnamon and Honey
home_remedies.description: Natural combination with antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Mix cinnamon and honey in warm water. 2. Stir well until dissolved. 3. Drink on empty stomach or before bed. 4. Can also make paste for direct application.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Use Ceylon cinnamon if possible (less coumarin). Not for children under 1 year. Avoid large amounts during pregnancy.

home_remedies.name: Green Tea
home_remedies.description: Antioxidant-rich tea for overall health and energy
ingredients: Green tea bag or loose leaves (1 tsp)
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Heat water to 175Â°F (not boiling). 2. Steep tea for 2-3 minutes. 3. Remove tea to avoid bitterness. 4. Add lemon or honey if desired.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Contains caffeine - avoid late in day. May interact with some medications. Limit to 3-4 cups daily.

home_remedies.name: Lavender Oil Aromatherapy
home_remedies.description: Essential oil therapy for relaxation and sleep support
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Add 3-5 drops to diffuser OR 2. Put 2 drops on pillow OR 3. Mix with carrier oil and apply to temples/wrists. 4. Inhale deeply and relax.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Never ingest essential oils. Dilute before skin application. Not for use during pregnancy without medical advice.

home_remedies.name: Coconut Oil Treatment
home_remedies.description: Natural oil for skin and hair health
home_remedies.preparation: For skin: Apply thin layer and massage in. For hair: Warm oil, apply to scalp and hair, leave 30 min, then wash. For lips: Apply small amount as lip balm.
home_remedies.safety_notes: May cause breakouts for acne-prone skin. Do patch test first. Use extra virgin for best quality.

home_remedies.name: Lemon Water Morning Detox
home_remedies.description: Warm lemon water first thing in morning for hydration and digestion
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Squeeze lemon into warm water. 2. Drink immediately on empty stomach. 3. Wait 15-30 minutes before eating. 4. Rinse mouth with plain water after to protect teeth.
home_remedies.time_to_effect: Immediate hydration, digestive benefits within 30 minutes
home_remedies.safety_notes: Can erode tooth enamel - use straw or rinse after. Not recommended for acid reflux sufferers.

home_remedies.name: Clove Oil for Toothache
home_remedies.description: Natural analgesic for dental pain relief
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Dilute clove oil with carrier oil (1:1 ratio). 2. Soak cotton ball in mixture. 3. Apply to affected tooth/gum area. 4. Leave for 15-20 minutes. 5. Rinse with salt water.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Use sparingly - can irritate gums if overused. Not a substitute for dental care. Avoid swallowing.

home_remedies.name: Ginger Compress for Pain
home_remedies.description: Topical ginger application for localized pain relief
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Grate fresh ginger. 2. Wrap in cloth and steep in hot water. 3. When cool enough to touch, apply to painful area. 4. Leave for 15-20 minutes. 5. Repeat 2-3 times daily.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Test temperature before applying. May cause skin sensitivity in some people. Don't use on broken skin.

home_remedies.name: Honey Face Mask
home_remedies.description: Natural face treatment for skin health
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Apply raw honey to clean face. 2. Leave for 15-20 minutes. 3. Rinse with warm water. 4. Pat dry and moisturize. 5. Use 2-3 times per week.
home_remedies.time_to_effect: Immediate softening, visible improvement over weeks
home_remedies.safety_notes: Not for those allergic to bee products. Use raw, unprocessed honey for best results.

home_remedies.name: Probiotic Foods
home_remedies.description: Fermented foods for gut health and immunity
ingredients: Yogurt, kefir, sauerkraut, kimchi, or kombucha
home_remedies.preparation: Include one serving of probiotic food daily. Start with small amounts if new to fermented foods. Choose products with live active cultures.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Start slowly to avoid digestive upset. Check sugar content in commercial products. Not for severe immune deficiency.

home_remedies.name: Eucalyptus Steam
home_remedies.description: Eucalyptus-infused steam for respiratory relief
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Boil water and pour into bowl. 2. Add eucalyptus oil. 3. Tent head with towel over bowl. 4. Breathe deeply through nose for 5-10 minutes. 5. Keep eyes closed.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Not for children under 10. Keep safe distance from hot water. Not recommended for asthmatics without medical advice.

home_remedies.name: Baking Soda Bath
home_remedies.description: Baking soda soak for skin irritation and detox
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Add baking soda to warm bath water. 2. Stir to dissolve. 3. Soak for 15-20 minutes. 4. Rinse with clean water. 5. Pat dry gently.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Don't use on broken skin. May dry out skin - moisturize after. Not for daily use.

home_remedies.name: Cumin Water
home_remedies.description: Cumin-infused water for digestive health and metabolism
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Soak cumin seeds in water overnight OR 2. Boil seeds in water for 5 minutes. 3. Strain and drink. 4. Best consumed on empty stomach morning.
home_remedies.safety_notes: Safe for most people. May lower blood sugar - monitor if diabetic. Avoid excessive amounts during pregnancy.

home_remedies.name: Witch Hazel Toner
home_remedies.description: Natural astringent for skin care
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Apply witch hazel to cotton pad. 2. Gently wipe affected area. 3. Allow to dry. 4. Follow with moisturizer if needed. 5. Use twice daily.
home_remedies.time_to_effect: Immediate toning, acne improvement over weeks
home_remedies.safety_notes: Avoid eye area. May cause dryness - use alcohol-free version. Do patch test first.

home_remedies.name: Valerian Root Tea
home_remedies.description: Herbal tea for sleep and relaxation
ingredients: Valerian root tea or dried root (1 tsp)
home_remedies.preparation: 1. Steep valerian in hot water for 10-15 minutes. 2. Strain and add honey if desired. 3. Drink 30 minutes to 1 hour before bed.
home_remedies.safety_notes: May cause drowsiness - don't drive after. Can interact with sedatives. Not for long-term use without breaks.

diet_plans.name: Anti-Inflammatory Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet focused on reducing inflammation in the body through whole foods
foods_to_avoid: Red meat (limit to once per week)

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Oatmeal with berries, walnuts, and a drizzle of honey
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled salmon salad with olive oil dressing and mixed greens
meal_suggestions.dinner: Baked fish with turmeric, steamed vegetables, and quinoa
meal_suggestions.snacks: Handful of almonds, fresh fruits, dark chocolate square

diet_plans.duration: Ongoing lifestyle - minimum 4 weeks to see results

diet_plans.name: Digestive Health Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet designed to improve digestion, gut health, and reduce GI discomfort

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Yogurt parfait with banana, oats, and a touch of honey
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled chicken with steamed rice and gently cooked vegetables
meal_suggestions.dinner: Light vegetable soup with whole grain bread
meal_suggestions.snacks: Papaya slices, ginger tea, plain crackers

diet_plans.name: Energy Boosting Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to combat fatigue and maintain steady energy throughout the day
foods_to_eat: Complex carbohydrates (brown rice, quinoa, sweet potatoes)

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Scrambled eggs with whole wheat toast, spinach, and avocado
meal_suggestions.lunch: Quinoa bowl with grilled chicken, vegetables, and tahini dressing
meal_suggestions.dinner: Lentil soup with brown rice and steamed broccoli
meal_suggestions.snacks: Trail mix, apple with almond butter, hard-boiled egg

diet_plans.name: Immune Boosting Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to strengthen the immune system and fight infections

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Fresh orange juice with oatmeal, almonds, and berries
meal_suggestions.lunch: Homemade chicken soup with vegetables and garlic bread
meal_suggestions.dinner: Grilled fish with lemon, garlic, steamed broccoli, and brown rice
meal_suggestions.snacks: Citrus fruits, yogurt, handful of almonds

diet_plans.name: Heart Healthy Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet for cardiovascular health, blood pressure, and cholesterol management

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Oatmeal with berries, flaxseeds, and walnuts
meal_suggestions.lunch: Mediterranean salad with olive oil, chickpeas, and feta
meal_suggestions.dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables and quinoa
meal_suggestions.snacks: Handful of walnuts, avocado toast, fresh fruit

diet_plans.duration: Lifestyle change, minimum 8 weeks for measurable results

diet_plans.name: Stress Relief Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to reduce stress, anxiety, and promote mental wellness

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Avocado toast with eggs and a cup of green tea
meal_suggestions.lunch: Salmon salad with mixed greens, walnuts, and olive oil
meal_suggestions.dinner: Turkey with whole grain pasta and steamed vegetables
meal_suggestions.snacks: Dark chocolate square, chamomile tea, banana with almond butter

diet_plans.name: Clear Skin Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to improve skin health, reduce acne, and promote clear complexion

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, berries, and almond milk
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled fish with large mixed salad
meal_suggestions.dinner: Vegetable stir-fry with brown rice and tofu
meal_suggestions.snacks: Carrot sticks, green tea, handful of almonds

diet_plans.name: Headache Prevention Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to prevent and manage headaches and migraines

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Whole grain cereal with fresh fruits and pumpkin seeds
meal_suggestions.lunch: Spinach salad with grilled fish and olive oil
meal_suggestions.dinner: Brown rice with vegetables and lean protein
meal_suggestions.snacks: Fresh fruits, almonds, plenty of water

diet_plans.duration: Ongoing prevention, keep food diary to identify triggers

diet_plans.name: Weight Management Diet
diet_plans.description: Balanced diet for healthy and sustainable weight management

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Egg white omelet with vegetables and whole wheat toast
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled chicken breast with large salad and vinaigrette
meal_suggestions.dinner: Steamed fish with vegetables and small portion of brown rice
meal_suggestions.snacks: Apple slices, celery with hummus, small handful of nuts

diet_plans.duration: Lifestyle change, steady progress over months

diet_plans.name: Hydration Focus Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet emphasizing proper hydration for overall health

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Fresh fruit smoothie with cucumber and coconut water
meal_suggestions.snacks: Cucumber slices, coconut water, orange slices

diet_plans.name: Sleep-Promoting Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to improve sleep quality and combat insomnia

meal_suggestions.lunch: Turkey sandwich on whole grain with salad
meal_suggestions.dinner: Grilled salmon with vegetables (finish 3 hours before bed)
meal_suggestions.evening_snack: Small bowl of tart cherries or kiwi, chamomile tea

diet_plans.duration: 2-3 weeks to establish better sleep patterns

diet_plans.name: BRAT Diet for Upset Stomach
diet_plans.description: Bland diet for recovering from stomach illness

meal_suggestions.lunch: Plain rice with clear chicken broth
meal_suggestions.snacks: Saltine crackers, small sips of water

diet_plans.duration: 24-48 hours, then gradually reintroduce normal foods

diet_plans.name: Anti-Anxiety Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet rich in nutrients that support mental health and reduce anxiety

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Eggs with avocado and green tea
meal_suggestions.lunch: Salmon salad with pumpkin seeds and olive oil
meal_suggestions.dinner: Turmeric-spiced chicken with vegetables and brown rice
meal_suggestions.snacks: Dark chocolate, blueberries, almonds, chamomile tea

diet_plans.name: Joint Health Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to support joint health and reduce arthritis symptoms

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Oatmeal with cherries, walnuts, and turmeric-spiced milk
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled salmon with broccoli and olive oil
meal_suggestions.dinner: Chicken with garlic, ginger stir-fry vegetables, brown rice
meal_suggestions.snacks: Berries, green tea, handful of walnuts

diet_plans.name: Blood Sugar Balancing Diet
diet_plans.description: Diet to maintain stable blood sugar levels

meal_suggestions.breakfast: Eggs with vegetables and one slice whole grain toast
meal_suggestions.lunch: Grilled chicken with large salad and chickpeas
meal_suggestions.snacks: Small handful of nuts, celery with almond butter

diet_plans.duration: Lifestyle change, blood sugar improvements in 2-4 weeks
